title: Is 'I never knew' correct or incorrect? - Quora

response.answer_text: It is correct. It is a common sentence. However, it should follow a statement about the topic about which the speaker never knew. “Helen is a great golfer? I never knew. I did not think she was athletic at all.” “I just heard that New Year’s Day was your birthday! I never knew that.”

Yes. “I never knew” is a correct phrase in slang, but gramatically in English it is incorrect. This is because we’re looking at a sentence with no Direct Object for the verb “knew”. The phrase “I never knew that,” would be a correct phrase grammatically in English according to grammar rules.
